title: JUL 19, 2022 - CITY OF PORTLAND TO PROMOTE ANTIFA SUMMER CAMP FOR 10-YEAR OLDS
description:
DOMESTIC INSURGENCY: the city of Portland is creating child soldiers at Antifa summer camps for 10-year-olds, aka training academies for domestic terrorists. The body cam footage of former Uvalde School Chief Arredondo was released and shows him trying to negotiate with the active shooter. Tekle Sundberg’s family pleaded with their son to cooperate with Minneapolis police; the police gave him every safe option to surrender and deescalate before shooting him. In the midst of contactless payments, Apple has been sued over apple pay antitrust violations. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec
